title: Ticket #5958: DC daemon flag '-local-name' should be changed to '--localname'
description: Since DC daemons in the DC daemon can be written by users, option names passed to them should respect unix conventions: single-dashed short names or double-dashed long names. Otherwise, it causes fits in standard option parsers.
remarks:

This would be nice but I don't ever see this happening. Abandoning
